MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G45 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:31pm. Our engineers have now arrived at the Castlelodge substation and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:10pm on Friday, 01 January 2021
